medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient's dyspnea has progressively worsened over the past year, now occurring on climbing one flight of stairs. No orthopnea, paroxysmal nocturnal dyspnea, edema, chest discomfort, palpitations, lightheadedness, or syncope are reported.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy (HOCM), hypertension, dyslipidemia, and obstructive sleep apnea.
medical_history.family_history: Family history notable for diabetes mellitus and stroke in the father; no family members with heart failure, hypertrophic cardiomyopathy (HCM), or sudden cardiac death (SCD).
medical_history.social_history: Retired electrician, married with 3 adult children, lives in Florida and Massachusetts half the year. History of heavy tobacco use, quit smoking more than 30 years ago.
